title: Shin Megami Tensei III: Nocturne - Konton
original_name: 真・女神転生 III ＮＯＣＴＵＲＮＥ 混沌
sinopse: The story follows high school student Shin Managi who, after visiting his teacher in a hospital, witnesses the end of the world. After this mysterious event he is granted supernatural powers, becoming half-demon and is able to recruit other demons to aid him.
